name: Little Invadeur
description:
Little Invadeur

This time around it is you that must invade Earth!
Dodge missiles and shoot tanks while you come closer and closer to victory!

CONTROLS: Left and right arrow keys. ESCAPE to quit. F5 to restart.

This game was created in 2 hours as a part of a challenge.

*This is the official page for this title. Anywhere else where this title appears to be available is unofficial and I cannot guarantee that it is safe to download*.
